f-avatar/icon.description: the Icon type for an icon avatar, see Icon Component

f-avatar/src.description: the address of the image for an image avatar

f-avatar/srcSet.description: a list of sources to use for different screen resolutions

f-avatar/alt.description: This attribute defines the alternative text describing the image

f-avatar/loadError.description: handler when img load errorï¼Œreturn false to prevent default fallback behavior

f-avatar/shape.description: can be set to circle or omitted

f-avatar/size.description: can be set to small large or omitted

f-avatar/type.description: can be set to primary ghost dashed danger(added in 2.7) or omitted (meaning default)

f-avatar/block.description: option to fit button width to its parent width
